description: This file defines a class YouTubeKnowledgeBase that manages YouTube video URLs and provides methods to retrieve associated documents both synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: YouTubeKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that extends AgentKnowledge to manage YouTube URLs and retrieve related documents synchronously and asynchronously.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: A property that yields lists of Document objects for each YouTube URL synchronously.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: An asynchronous property that yields lists of Document objects for each YouTube URL asynchronously.
